Text: Always remember to block applications (or go off line) from calling  home 'during install'. Once installed, disable 'check for automatic   updates' option if available, so that you don't get it blacklisted

Any chance you could explain how to properly use the Keygen? 

I used the E-Mail address already input into the E-Mail selection, and the Key generated, but I received an error message "Registration failed. Check User email and registration code."

I tried doing this online and offline.

Any reply appreciated, thanks!
Please ignore my last comment. Software internal registration succeeded :) Thanks for the upload!
